divs: Sighting DetailsClear night no clouds viewable stars. I went out for a cigarette and saw an amber twinkling light flying near the airport. At first I thought a helicopter but after it for a couple of seconds I noticed it didn't have the light characteristics of any type of plane. I am an aviation enthusiast and I'm always Stargazing. While I watched it a plane passed the object and had normal light characteristics. The actual plane was a few miles south of the UFO and I could hear the actual plane where the UFO had no sound. After 45 seconds of noticing it weird it just vanished.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There was one other sighting in San Jose on or around December 30th 2012
Summary: looked like a lit cigar flying
